channel.title: Libraries on Michael Campfield | Beyond the Mythre
channel.description: Recent content in Libraries on Michael Campfield | Beyond the Mythre

item.description: Libraries have a beauty all their own transcending woodwork, marble, volumes, and time: IE, Dublin: Old College (Long Room), Trinity College, Dublin MA, Boston: Boston College, Bapst Library MA, Boston: Boston Public Library, Central branch MD, Baltimore: George Peabody Library MO, St. Louis: St. Louis Central Library (Carnegie) TN, Harriman: Harriman Public Library(Carnegie) TN, Nashville: Nashville East Brach Library(Carnegie) TN, Nashville: Nashville Main Library
